detailsData.title: Experienced Trial Lawyer
detailsData.content: Our founder Edward Perdue has over twenty-four years of experience at a large national law firm. He has practiced at the highest level in many state and federal courts across the nation.

detailsData.title: Lean Operation
detailsData.content: The firm is organized as a lean operation which harnesses the power of technology to bring unparalleled efficiency. This allows us to provide 'big law' quality and service with significant cost savings.

detailsData.title: Alternative Dispute Resolution
detailsData.content: We explore and present clients with alternative dispute resolution strategies early in the life of each case. This approach helps in achieving client objectives in a smarter and more efficient manner.

detailsData.title: Commitment to Diversity
detailsData.content: As a minority and service-disabled veteran-owned small business, we are dedicated to exceptional client service. Our founder is the son of a Colombian immigrant and a fluent Spanish speaker.

subHeading: No case too difficult, no sacrifice too great.
valueProp: Perdue Law Group is a boutique civil litigation firm based in Grand Rapids, Michigan. Born from a desire to service a broader range of clients, this firm is dedicated to assisting its clients navigate the treacherous waters of today's civil justice system.
CTA: WE FIGHT TIRELESSLY FOR OUR CLIENTS' INTERESTS.
